channel.title: Extended emote system big error!

item.title: Extended emote system big error!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude462 sk8rdude462
item.description:
@sk8rdude462 wrote:

So I got SWAT’s emote system done correctly now I was trying to do the Extended emote system tut he made and I got an extremely rare problem I presume. I am at the last part where I need to add the public static void into Class20.java
